introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At AlmuerzosPer√∫, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our customers' personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when you use our restaurant services, website and mobile applications.

personal.title: 2.1 Personal Information
items: Full name and contact information (phone, email, address)
Order information and dietary preferences
Purchase history and transactions
Payment information (processed securely)

technical.title: 2.2 Technical Information
items: IP address and browsing data
Cookies and similar technologies
Device information and usage patterns
Location data (with your permission)

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
items: Process and fulfill your orders
Improve our services and user experience
Send order confirmations and updates
Provide customer support
Analyze usage patterns and preferences
Send promotional offers (with your consent)

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:
items: With your explicit consent
To fulfill your orders (delivery partners)
To comply with legal obligations
To protect our rights and security
sharing.notice: All our business partners are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information.
sharing.content: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except:

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction. However, no transmission over the Internet is completely secure.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: As a data subject, you have the following rights:
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Object to data processing
Data portability

cookies.title: 7. Cookies Policy
cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, although this may affect some functionalities.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.intro: If you have questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, you can contact us through the following means:
contact.address: Av. Javier Prado Este 123, San Isidro, Lima, Peru
contact.content: For questions about this policy, contact us at: support@almuerzosperu.com

items: Treat staff with respect and courtesy
Provide accurate information for orders and deliveries

Comply with reservation schedules
